Room.Name: Bendine Way/Islandia Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Islandia Drive and Bendine Way.
Room.LongDescription: Bendine Way runs north and south, intersecting Islandia Way, running east and west. On the northeast corner of the intersection, you can see the North Oceancrest Hot Springs and Spa. On the northwest corner is the famous Cathedral of Worldly Bliss. Bendine Way heads south towards the Nylandian Bay and Islandia heads west towards the Bendine Aquarium and Marina.
